summary: osmdroid and andnav share many sources .. AND .jar does not contains osmdroid files.

comments.content:
First, thanks for those great libraries ! And for opensourcing andnav.

The org.andnav and org.osmdroid share many almost identical sources files.
Some are just prefixed by OpenStreetMap.

eg: geopoint.java or mymath.java and many many more.
Did i break something ?


By the way, downloading the jar file 1.10, I discovered that it was missing all osmdroid specific files. Is it normal too ?!


Cheers,
Simon Th√©pot

The org.andnav should be deleted in the near future. See issue 130 and issue 112.

Thanks for submitting this issue as a reminder!

The latest jar is osmdroid-android-3.0.0.jar.
This issue was closed by revision r747.
